class.rdfs:comment: The Game type represents things which are games. These are typically rule-governed recreational activities, e.g. role-playing games in which players assume the role of characters in a fictional setting.
class.rdfs:label: Game

schema:characterAttribute.rdfs:comment: A piece of data that represents a particular aspect of a fictional character (skill, power, character points, advantage, disadvantage).
schema:characterAttribute.rdfs:label: characterAttribute

schema:gameItem.rdfs:comment: An item is an object within the game world that can be collected by a player or, occasionally, a non-player character.
schema:gameItem.rdfs:label: gameItem

schema:gameLocation.rdfs:comment: Real or fictional location of the game (or part of game).
schema:gameLocation.rdfs:label: gameLocation

schema:numberOfPlayers.rdfs:comment: Indicate how many people can play this game (minimum, maximum, or range).
schema:numberOfPlayers.rdfs:label: numberOfPlayers

schema:quest.rdfs:comment: The task that a player-controlled character, or group of characters may complete in order to gain a reward.
schema:quest.rdfs:label: quest
